original: dang po rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:de'i 'od kyis lus bdag dang gzhan dang zhing sbyang bar bya'o //

translated: First, the yogin should visualize an ā syllable in his heart, from which arises a moon maṇḍala. Upon that, there is the syllable hrīḥ. Its light purifies the body, self and others, and the realm.

original: de nas 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyan drang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, light radiates and invites Vajravārāhī and the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: de nas phyag byas te /
analyzed: de nas phyag byas te /
translated: Then, having made prostrations,

original: nang gi mchod pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / phyi'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi mchod pa dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / phyi'i mchod pa'o //
translated: there is the inner offering, the secret offering, and the outer offering.

original: de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / rdzes su yi rang ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang / rdzes su yi rang ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: In their presence, one should confess misdeeds, rejoice, make requests, and dedicate the roots of virtue.

original: de nas skyabs su 'gro ba bya'o //
analyzed: de nas skyabs su 'gro ba bya'o //
translated: Then, one should go for refuge.

original: de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgoms la byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //🔽de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgoms la byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o // de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: Then, having meditated on love, compassion, joy, and equanimity, one should generate the mind of enlightenment.

original: zhes brjod la /
analyzed: zhes brjod la /
translated: Then, one should recite:🔽Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ.

original: rang gi lus dang / zla ba dang yi ge dang / thig le yang mi snang bar byas nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
analyzed: rang gi lus dang / zla ba dang yi ge dang / thig le yang mi snang bar byas nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms la /
translated: Having made one’s body, the moon, the letters, and the drop invisible, one should meditate on emptiness.

original: auom  sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: auom  sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o //
translated: One should stabilize it with: Oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ.

original: de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
analyzed: de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
translated: Then, from paṃ, there is an eight-petaled lotus.

original: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor //
translated: Upon that, from aḥ, there is a moon maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du hr'i: dmar po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang / lte ba la nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: dmar po /
analyzed: de'i steng du hr'i: dmar po las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po dang / lte ba la nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: dmar po /
translated: Upon that, from a red hrīḥ, there is a red five-tined vajra and, in its center, a red hrīḥ upon a sun.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis 'gro ba sbyangs te /
translated: Light rays from that refine migrating beings.

original: slar 'dus pa dang / de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: slar 'dus pa dang / de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: They all gather back and completely transform into

original: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa /
translated: Vajravārāhī, with one face and three eyes.

original: sku mdog dmar ba zhal mche ba gtsigs pa skra grol ba /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar ba zhal mche ba gtsigs pa skra grol ba /
translated: Her body is red, with bared fangs and loose hair.

original: phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa /
translated: She has two arms

original: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa /
translated: and is naked, adorned with a garland of heads.

original: phyag g-yas na gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas na gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa /
translated: In her right hand she holds a vajra threatening gesture to the wicked.🔽In her left hand she holds a skull cup filled with blood and a khaṭvāṅga.

original: g-yon na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa bskal pa'i me lta bu'i gzi brjid dang ldan ba /🔽bde @112a * //
analyzed: g-yon na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang kha tv'am ga bsnams pa bskal pa'i me lta bu'i gzi brjid dang ldan ba / bde @112a * //
translated: She has the brilliance of the fire of the end of time,

original: ba chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: ba chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: and she is the nature of great bliss and great compassion.

original: nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: sa snying ga byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma la gnas pa'i hr'i: sa snying ga byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The consecration of the heart is the hṛīḥ on the sun.

original: mgo bor aom dkar po /
analyzed: mgo bor aom dkar po /
translated: At the head is a white oṃ,

original: mgrin par a'a: dmar po //
analyzed: mgrin par a'a: dmar po //
translated: at the throat a red āḥ,

original: snying gar h'um nag po bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: snying gar h'um nag po bsam par bya'o //
translated: and at the heart a black hūṃ.

original: de nas yi ge bzhi las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / ye shes sems dpa' bskul te spyan drangs la yi ge so so la thim par bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas yi ge bzhi las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / ye shes sems dpa' bskul te spyan drangs la yi ge so so la thim par bsam mo //
translated: Then, light rays shine from the four syllables, invoking the body, speech, mind, and gnosis beings of all tathāgatas in the ten directions, which dissolve into the individual syllables.

original: de'i rjes la aom a'a: h'um hr'i: h'um sarbba yo gi n'i k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de'i rjes la aom a'a: h'um hr'i: h'um sarbba yo gi n'i k'a ya b'a ka tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: After that, recite: oṃ āḥ hūṃ hriḥ hūṃ sarva yogiṇī kāya vāk citta vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: zhes pa dang / aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharma badzra shuddho& ham /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharma badzra shuddho& ham /
translated: and: oṃ vajra-śuddha sarva-dharmā vajra-śuddho ’haṃ

original: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
translated: and stabilize the pride.

original: de nas lte bar aom bam rdo rje phag mo /
analyzed: de nas lte bar aom bam rdo rje phag mo /
translated: Then, at the navel, oṃ vaṃ is Vajravārāhī.

original: snying gar ham yom ya mi ni /
analyzed: snying gar ham yom ya mi ni /
translated: At the heart, haṃ yoṃ is Yamī.

original: khar aom hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o //
analyzed: khar aom hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o //
translated: At the mouth, oṃ hriṃ moṃ is Moharā.

original: mgo bor aom hrem hrim skyong byed ma'o //
analyzed: mgo bor aom hrem hrim skyong byed ma'o //
translated: At the head, oṃ hreṃ hreṃ is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: spyi gtsug tu aom h'um h'um skrag byed ma'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug tu aom h'um h'um skrag byed ma'o //
translated: At the crown, oṃ hūṃ hūṃ is Bhīma.

original: yan lag thams cad la phat phat tsandi ka'o //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad la phat phat tsandi ka'o //
translated: At all the limbs, phaṭ phaṭ is Caṇḍikā.

original: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to invite the gnosis being,

original: snying ga'i hr'i: las 'od 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo spyan drangs te /
analyzed: snying ga'i hr'i: las 'od 'phros pas rdo rje phag mo spyan drangs te /
translated: light shines from the hriḥ in the heart, inviting Vajravārāhī.

original: snying po'i phyag rgya bstan la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas gnyis su med par bya ste /
analyzed: snying po'i phyag rgya bstan la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas gnyis su med par bya ste /
translated: Display the essence mudra and say jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ to make them nondual.

original: aom yo ga shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom yo ga shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
translated: Say oṃ yoga śuddhaḥ sarvadharma yogaiśuddho ’haṃ.

original: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pas nga rgyal brtan par bya'o //
translated: Make the identity firm with that.

original: de nas hr'i:'i 'od kyis rgyal ba rigs lnga spyan drangs te /
analyzed: de nas hr'i:'i 'od kyis rgyal ba rigs lnga spyan drangs te /
translated: Then, the five family conquerors are invited with the light of hriḥ.

original: mchod pa byas te /🔽byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
analyzed: mchod pa byas te / byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
translated: Make offerings.🔽Just as the buddhas were offered and requested

original: ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar //🔽bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
analyzed: ji ltar mchod cing gsol ba ltar // bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
translated: by the bodhisattvas,🔽please grant me the vajra of space

original: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
translated: for the purpose of protection.

original: zhes gsol ba btab pas rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas mkha' 'gro ma lnga phyag na bum pa thogs pa byung nas /
analyzed: zhes gsol ba btab pas rigs lnga'i thugs ka nas mkha' 'gro ma lnga phyag na bum pa thogs pa byung nas /
translated: Through this supplication, the five dakinis holding vases arise from the hearts of the five families.

original: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
translated: They confer the empowerment of the great vajra.

original: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing //
analyzed: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing //
translated: He is worshipped by all the three worlds,

original: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
analyzed: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
translated: and arises from the place of the three secrets.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
translated: He is given by all the buddhas.

original: zhes pa dang / ji ltar bltams pa zhes pas sngags kyi dbang bskur la /
analyzed: zhes pa dang / ji ltar bltams pa zhes pas sngags kyi dbang bskur la /
translated: And with “Just as he was born…” the empowerment of mantra is conferred.

original: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
analyzed: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam mo //
translated: One should imagine that Akṣobhya crowns one’s head.

original: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdud rtsi myang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bstod pa bya'o //
translated: Then one should perform the tasting of elixir, the offerings, and the praises.

original: de nas rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pas ci nus su bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pas ci nus su bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then one should meditate on the four yogas as much as one can.

original: skyo bar gyur na snying po @112b dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: skyo bar gyur na snying po @112b dang nye ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o //
translated: If one becomes weary, one should recite the essence and the quintessence.

original: thun bar rnams la skad cig mas lhar bsam /
analyzed: thun bar rnams la skad cig mas lhar bsam /
translated: In the intervals between sessions, one should imagine oneself as the deity in an instant.

original: dbang dang bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o /
analyzed: dbang dang bzlas pa'i bar du bya'o /
translated: One should perform the empowerment and the recitation.

original: thun tha ma la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / yi ge brgya pa dang smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: thun tha ma la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang / yi ge brgya pa dang smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: In the final session, one should perform the departure of the awareness beings, the hundred syllables, and the aspiration prayers, and so forth.

original: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Sādhana of Vajravārāhī

original: pandi ta chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: pandi ta chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The great paṇḍita Śrī Dīpaṃkara Śrījñāna’s composition is complete.
